name: Antarctica's Sole Survivor
description:
🧊About Due to climate change, the Antarctica's glaciers are melting completely, and our last polar bear is obliged to climb out of a hole without drowning. Will he be the last polar bear survivor ? 🕹️How to Play

Space to Jump

Arrows or WASD to move.

E to use the Super Jump.

✨Credits
